channel.title: Laravel on htr3n's
channel.link:
https://htr3n.github.io/tags/laravel/Recent content in Laravel on htr3n'sHugo -- gohugo.ioenWed, 09 May 2018 00:00:00 +0000
Integration Laravel 5 and Gentelella admin themehttps://htr3n.github.io/2018/05/integration-laravel-gentelella/Wed, 09 May 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/05/integration-laravel-gentelella/Gentelella is a very nice and gently-looking Bootstrap based admin theme developed by Aigars Silkalns (aka puikinsh). It can be integrated into several Web application frameworks. This post is one of my development exercises in which Gentelella is used to decorate a Laravel 5 based Web application.
LaraMod - Modularised Laravel 5https://htr3n.github.io/2018/01/laramod/Fri, 19 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/01/laramod/Laravel is an amazing emerging, well-designed and well-developed PHP framework. It is currently under active development and has been among top Web development frameworks. For a simple development project, the structure is totally fine.
